name: TroutGame
description:
Controls

Move Forward: W, Arrowkey Up, or Up on right joystick

Move Backwards: S, Arrowkey Down, or Down on right joystick

Turn Clockwise: D, Arrowkey Right, or Right on left joystick

Turn Counterclockwise: A, Arrowkey Left, or Left on left joystick

Quit Game: Escape

Note: Controller is only set up for xbox controller layouts and may not work on other controllers.
